title: WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Company Secretary Post
description: Water and Power Consultancy Services (WAPCOS) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for the Company Secretary Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the WAPCOS Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
